title: The Opening
content: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Praise be to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.
author: Quran 1:1

title: The Light
content: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The parable of His light is as if there were a niche, and within it a lamp: the lamp enclosed in glass: the glass as it were a brilliant star...
author: Quran 24:35

title: The Dawn
content: And the morning light. And the night when it covers with darkness. Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor hated you.
author: Quran 93:1-3

title: The Merciful
content: The Most Merciful. Taught the Quran, Created man, And taught him eloquence.
author: Quran 55:1-4

title: The Purity
content: Say, 'He is Allah, [who is] One, Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born, Nor is there to Him any equivalent.'
author: Quran 112:1-4

title: The Victory
content: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest, And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes, Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
author: Quran 110:1-3
